website.name: PROMPT AI
footer.title: PROMPT AI
footer.subtitle: HELP AND SUPPORT
banner.title: Conversational AI for Everyone
banner.description: PromptDialog is a no-code development environment built for rapid dialog design and deployment. It is based on RASA, but again does not require specific RASA knowledge to design and deploy chatbots. PromptDialog uses natural language to design natural language dialogs. It minimizes annotation and coding effort and is designed to launch enterprise chatbots in minutes. PromptDialog enables your design team to quickly identify dialog errors and improve your designs. You can also download the generated RASA source code files for free and deploy them privately.
banner.description.extends: Based on RASA, we have added support for LLM, which can answer customer questions directly based on text, reduce the amount of annotation by more than 10 times, and improve the quality of dialogue.
introduction.part.conversation.subtitle: VISUAL CONVERSATION EDITOR
introduction.part.conversation.title: Design and implement your conversations at once
introduction.part.conversation.descripti: Create natural dialogue flows in our intuitive conversation based interface. Add natural language examples on the fly, create rich responses with buttons, images, and Webhook. Let engineers focus on systems and API integration.
introduction.part.form.subtitle: CONVERSATIONAL FORMS
introduction.part.form.title: Create complex conversational forms
introduction.part.form.description: Whether you want to collect information or to prepare an API call, our no-code flow editor lets you implement complex business logic with fine grained conditionals and user input validation.
introduction.part.customizing.subtitle: CUSTOMIZING
introduction.part.customizing.title: Easily compile and debug easily
introduction.part.customizing.descriptio: We provide different ways of debugging solutions to meet the different needs of the business.
introduction.part.llm.title: Easily connect with Large language model
introduction.part.llm.description: Provides one-click access mode, no programming required. Open interface for easy access to any Large language model.
introduction.part.llm.subtitle: LLM
examples.title: More Examples
examples.Retail-R1.mp4.title: Retail Starter Pack
examples.Retail-R1.mp4.description: The Retail starter pack is an open source example chatbot for ecommerce customer service. It can assist with operations like checking an order status, seeing if an item is in stock, and initiating a return. The assistant uses forms to collect information and queries a SQLite database for customer and order information.
examples.Financial-R1.mov.title: Financial Services
examples.Financial-R1.mov.description: The financial services demo bot can help users with three main tasks: Transferring money to another person’s account.Checking earning or spending history, with a specific vendor or overall.Paying a credit card bill.
examples.IT-Helpdesk-R1.mov.title: IT Helpdesk Starter Pack
examples.IT-Helpdesk-R1.mov.description: The IT Helpdesk demo bot can open an incident report via a Service Now integration. This assistant is a great starting point for building an IT helpdesk chatbot of your own, or you can use it as a reference for integrating a customer service ticketing system.
feature.title: PROMPT AI New Release & New Feature
feature.bottom.title: The first cloud version will be followed by a local deployment version. If you have any suggestions, please contact us.
feature.1.title: Programming without code
feature.1.description: Our visual dialogue editing environment can be used quickly whether you understand RASA or not. It also allows you to implement complex business logic with fine-grained conditions and user input validation. Automatically generate RASA code after successful release, and provide open source code download for further learning and mastering RASA
feature.2.title: Total project management
feature.2.description: Entities, intents, slots (variables), and dialog flow graphs are fully displayed in the same integrated development environment (IDE). Different dialogue modules can be combined and released with one click. Provide Web/Mobile and other methods for non-intrusive publishing, without modifying business codes, just copy a few lines of codes to your application to have dialogue capabilities
feature.3.title: Open predefined
feature.3.description: Provides various predefined entities and intents to reduce the amount of user-labeled data and facilitate rapid development.
feature.4.title: Sub-module fast debugging
feature.4.description: For the first time, software development process and dialog system design/debugging are combined. Each module can be compiled separately or jointly, which is convenient for testing and quick debugging.
